content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 6, Roma 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 6, Roma 1.
Goal!  Barcelona 6, Roma 1. Edin Dzeko (Roma) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Lucas Digne with a cross.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kostas Manolas.
Attempt blocked. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Adriano.
Offside, Barcelona. Luis Suárez tries a through ball, but Adriano is caught offside.
Foul by Adriano (Barcelona).
William Vainqueur (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergi Samper (Barcelona).
William Vainqueur (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edin Dzeko (Roma).
Dani Alves (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Penalty saved! Edin Dzeko (Roma) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Thomas Vermaelen (Barcelona) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Roma. Edin Dzeko draws a foul in the penalty area.
Edin Dzeko (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Dangerous play by Adriano (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Wojciech Szczesny.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Adriano with a through ball.
Offside, Barcelona. Ivan Rakitic tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.

Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Goal!  Barcelona 6, Roma 0. Adriano (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Neymar (Barcelona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.

Substitution, Roma. Salih Ucan replaces Miralem Pjanic.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Kostas Manolas.
Attempt blocked. Adriano (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Neymar.
